Title: Syntactic Abstraction
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 19:14:57 GMT Server: Apache/1.0.3 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 1463 Last-modified: Mon, 04 Dec 1995 18:59:05 GMT Syntactic Abstraction Syntactic Abstraction Description: Traditional macros used to extend programming languages suffer from semantic difficulties due to unintended variable bindings that occur as the result of the code transformations specified by macro transformers.
